questions.question: Choose the correct sentence (set grammar 1)
options: She don't likes walking in the city.
He doesn't have any experience with cars.
They wasn't aware of the traffic rules.
We is going to buy a new vehicle.
questions.answer: He doesn't have any experience with cars.

questions.question: Choose the correct sentence (set grammar2)
options: The tires needs to be replaced.
She has been waiting for the bus for an hour.
He were late to the meeting.
questions.answer: She has been waiting for the bus for an hour.

questions.question: What is the device used to reduce the speed of a vehicle? (set vocabulary 1)
What is the term for the transparent screen in front of the driver? (set vocabulary 2)
